announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 1st February, 2026. Offertory will be led by Sacred Heart of Jesus Confraternity and the Thursday borns. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: Fourth Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Parish 2026 calendars are available for purchase. Any additional revenue generated beyond the cost from this year's sales will go directly into donations towards the needy
announcements.title: 2026 Calendar Sales

announcements.details: Effective January 2026, Stole fees for the celebration of the sacraments and church dues have been reviewed.
announcements.title: Revision of Stole Fees and Church Dues

announcements.details: Parents and guardians with wards in boarding and tertiary schools are encouraged to submit their details to members of the Formation Team or the Youth Council.
announcements.title: School Visitation Project

events.details: Date: 4th - 6th February, 2026 | Time: 7:00pm | Venue: Church premises
events.title: Revival
